title: Diamond and Sapphire Cascade Haaram - A Touch of Telugu Elegance
materials: Sapphire Drops. Crafted with our signature Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting brilliance.
features: This exquisite Haaram features a cascade design inspired by traditional Telugu jewelry, reimagined with a modern sensibility. The delicate gold filigree supports rows of dazzling brilliant-cut diamonds, culminating in vibrant sapphire drops. The pendant style evokes the traditional mango design ('manga mala'), streamlined for today's discerning woman.
colors: deep blue sapphires. A harmonious blend of warm and cool tones
perfect for complementing any skin tone.
occasions: and festive celebrations. This piece is also suitable for special occasions where you want to make a statement.
description: A seamless fusion of traditional Telugu design and contemporary elegance. The exceptional diamond quality ensures a radiant sparkle, while the vibrant sapphires add a touch of regal charm. Handcrafted by skilled artisans in Hyderabad, this Haaram is a testament to superior craftsmanship and timeless style. A statement piece that will be treasured for generations.
